name: mermaid skirt fall/winter weight
description:
This versatile skirt can also be worn as a tunic top over a tight T or alone.
Made of soft Italian merino wool, Bamboo, viscose and silk this piece is a cool weather staple. The flattering shape can be worn several ways as well, whatever looks best on you!

Color ways are Red/cream  Green/Blue and Sable/cream

Sizes are sm/Med and Med/Large

name: OBi Shrug
description:
Beautiful OBi Shrug, made for warm and cold weather. The obi waist and kimono sleeves make for a gorgeous fit and silouhette. The winter weight is made of a fine spun merino wool, silk and viscose. The Summer weight is made of a smooth cool Bamboo, silk and viscose.

Sizes are Sm/Med and Med/Lrg

Many colorways are available, please contact we with your request.

name: Cowl Sweater
description:
This elegant sweater will keep you cozy while looking wonderful. The open sleeves allow for layering comfort. Made of either alpaca or merino wool, you will love this piece for many seasons.

Colors, alpaca in chocolate and merino wool in poppy red, chartreuse, cream, black, camel

name: Athena top
description:
This beauty is designed with many asymetric details that make for a shape worthy of a godess and it will make you look like one too! Made of a special yarn from Italy it holds its shape well.

Colors are light blue, Sand (shown), and carnavale (multi-colored)

Sizes Sm/med and Med/Lrg

name: Kimono Shrug
description:
This is your go to piece when you need to throw on something warm that looks great. A best-seller, it can be worn two different ways where the piece can be turned upside down and worn for a different collar.
Almost anything can go underneath as the generous kimono sleeves allow movement and room.

Sizes Sm/Med and Med/Lrg

many colorways available, please contact me for more information
